title: Hi, I'm
description: Based in Lille, I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for web design and games. Mastering Front-End and Back-End technologies, I create interactive and aesthetic experiences. Expert in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more. Ready to take on new creative and technical challenges.
about.subtitle: Explore the future with confidence and ambition. Every idea becomes an opportunity, every project is shaped to reach new heights. Together, let's turn your dreams into a successful reality, with the flexibility and expertise of a freelance developer dedicated to your success.
services-description: Turn your ideas into digital reality with my expertise as a freelance developer. From concept to creation, each project receives the personalised attention it needs to reach its full potential. Together, we can build an exceptional digital experience.
projects-description: Discover the power of innovation through my projects. Each project embodies the union of creativity and technical expertise, delivering bespoke solutions that exceed expectations. Explore my successes, and imagine the potential I can bring to your next challenge.
service-1-desc: Create a memorable identity with my personalised branding service.
service-2-desc: Turn your vision into reality with my bespoke design service.
service-3-desc: Turn your ideas into reality with my agile development service.
service-4-desc: Sharpen your message with my precise, hard-hitting copywriting service.
service-5-desc: Boost your visibility on search engines with my effective SEO service.
